mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (product_name, product_price, product_script, product_category, product_stock, product_image_check) VALUES (#{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_script}, #{product_category}, #{product_stock}, #{product_image_check})
INSERT INTO product_image (originalImageName, storedImageName, product_id) VALUES (#{originalImageName}, #{storedImageName}, #{product_id})
mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_script, p.product_stock, p.product_category, p.product_image_check, p.created_at, p.updated_at, i.originalImageName, i.storedImageName FROM products p LEFT JOIN product_image i ON p.product_id = i.product_id

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_script, p.product_stock, p.product_category, p.product_image_check, p.created_at, p.updated_at, i.originalImageName, i.storedImageName FROM products p LEFT JOIN product_image i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE p.product_id = #{p.product_id}
SELECT storedImageName FROM product_image WHERE product_id = #{product_id}
